text: Long Beach Airport is a city-owned public-use airport three nautical miles (6 km) northeast of the central business district of the City of Long Beach, in Los Angeles County, California, United States. It serves Los Angeles and Orange Counties. It is also called Daugherty Field. It used to be called Long Beach Municipal Airport. ==References== ==Other websites== * Long Beach Airport, official web site * Historic California Posts: Long Beach Army Air Field Category:Airports in California Category:Long Beach, California
title: Long Beach Airport
